episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... Medicine
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: Ricky Gervais, Steve Merchant and Karl Pilkington are back soon with a new series of in-depth explorations, starting with MEDICINE. Here's a free sample of what to expect, and there'll be further erudite discussions throughout the year.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... Natural History
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The second topic for discussion in the new series of Ricky Gervais Guides To... is NATURAL HISTORY. Here's a brief sample in which Karl engages in a little bestial cherry-picking.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... The Arts
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: Episode 3 is out February 2009 - This time it's The Ricky Gervais Guide To... THE ARTS. Ricky and Steve introduce this clip from the new episode; Karl describes life in his art-free living room.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... Philosophy
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: Episode 4 is out 17 March 2009 - It's the Ricky Gervais Guide To... Philosophy. Here's Ricky Steve and Karl to tell you about it and introduce a clip from the new episode.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... The English
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: Episode 5 is out April 21st 2009 - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... The English in celebration of St George's Day. Here's a free excerpt. Get the whole show from iTunes 21 April.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... Society
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The 6th episode - The Ricky Gervais Guide To Society - kicks off a new run of discussions for your listening edification. This free excerpt features Karl Pilkington's model adoption agency. Get the full episode from Nov 3 on iTunes Audiobooks.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... Law and Order
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The 7th episode - The Ricky Gervais Guide To Law and Order - continues this new run of in-depth discussions. This free excerpt features Ricky having problems with his waterworks. Get the full episode from December 1 on iTunes Audiobooks.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... The Future
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The 8th episode - The Ricky Gervais Guide To The Future - continues this new run of in-depth discussions. This free excerpt and bonus chat features Ricky, Steve and Karl's thoughts about good food. Get the full episode now on iTunes Audiobooks.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... The Human Body
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The 9th episode - The Ricky Gervais Guide To The Human Body - continues this new run of in-depth discussions. This free excerpt and bonus chat features some minty fresh memories. Get the full episode from January 26 on iTunes Audiobooks.

episodes.title: Out Now - The Ricky Gervais Guide To... The Earth
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The 10th and final episode in this series - The Ricky Gervais Guide To The Earth - continues this new run of in-depth discussions. This free excerpt and bonus chat features a salutary lesson in bed buying. Get the full episode now on iTunes Audiobooks.

episodes.title: Equality Street
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: The Brent and Johnson music video from youtube.com/rickygervais - Written by David Brent and Dom Johnson (Ricky Gervais and Doc Brown), Music produced by Mikis Michaledes

episodes.title: Learn Guitar with David Brent - Teaser
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: New series starts 20 May exclusively at youtube.com/rickygervais - Learn Guitar with David Brent

episodes.title: Teaser 2 - Learn Guitar with David Brent
episodes.author: Ricky Gervais
episodes.summary: Watch every epiosde so far at youtube.com/rickygervais - Learn Guitar with David Brent

episodes.title: Lady Gypsy - Live at London's Bloomsbury Theatre
episodes.author: David Brent
episodes.summary: David Brent sings the lyrical ballad, Lady Gypsy. A highlight from his recent shows at London's Bloomsbury Theatre.

episodes.title: Slough (studio demo)
episodes.author: David Brent
episodes.summary: David Brent's heartfelt love-letter to his native Slough.

episodes.title: Special Correspondents - Trailer 1
episodes.author: David Brent
episodes.summary: First look at Ricky's new movie. Only on Netfllix - April 29.

episodes.title: Don't Cry It's Christmas by David Brent
episodes.author: David Brent
episodes.summary: From my album, David Brent - Life On The Road, available at all good record shops and off the internet. Makes a wonderful Christmas gift - just like this video; my Christmas gift to you. Merry Christmas!
